General.Name: Fortune Ng Fung Food Hebei Co Ltd
General.Description: Fortune Ng Fung Food (Hebei) Co.,Ltd engages in the beef cattle breeding and slaughtering, and food processing businesses in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers a series of prepared dishes, sour beef, Chinese-style sauce, and stewed products; western-style low-temperature, conditioned, and dish-like meat products; quick-frozen food and dairy products; and a series of OEM products, as well as catering chain and funeral services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Sanhe, the People's Republic of China.
